titles.title: Permanent Internet Tax Freedom Act
Permanent Internet Tax Freedom Act
To make the moratorium on Internet access taxes and multiple and discriminatory taxes on electronic commerce permanent.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Regulatory Reform, Commercial And Antitrust Law.

committee.name: House Judiciary
committee.subcommittee: Administrative State, Regulatory Reform, and Antitrust

bill.summary: Permanent Internet Tax Freedom Act - Amends the Internet Tax Freedom Act to make permanent the ban on state and local taxation of Internet access and on multiple or discriminatory taxes on electronic commerce.
